mapper.insert: insert into t_cus_dev_plan (id, sale_chance_id, plan_item, plan_date, exe_affect, create_date, update_date, is_valid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleChanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{exeAffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_cus_dev_plan set sale_chance_id = #{saleChanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_item = #{planItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_date = #{planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exe_affect = #{exeAffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, sale_chance_id, plan_item, plan_date, exe_affect, create_date, update_date, is_valid from t_cus_dev_plan where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
